/lab4.html:
{"tests":{"test":"1352299311"},"state":{"Lab 4":"////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
// Lab 4
////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////

// Include the checkoff program:
.include "checkoff.uasm"

TestCase: LONG(0)

partition:
        PUSH(LP)
        PUSH(BP)
        MOVE(SP, BP)
		PUSH(R1)
		PUSH(R2)
		PUSH(R3)
		PUSH(R4)
		PUSH(R5)
		PUSH(R6)
		PUSH(R7)
		PUSH(R8)
		PUSH(R9)
		PUSH(R10)
		PUSH(R11)
		
		LD(BP, -12, R1)
		LD(BP, -16, R2)
		LD(BP, -20, R3)
	
		array=R1
		left=R2
		right=R3
 		pivotIndex=R4
 		pivotValue=R5
 		storeIndex=R6

		ADD(left, right, R0)
		SHRC(R0, 1, pivotIndex) //pivotIndex = (left+right) >> 1;
		
		SHLC(pivotIndex, 2, R0)
		ADD(array, R0, R0)
		LD(R0, 0, pivotValue) // pivotValue = array[pivotIndex]

		// #swap array[right] and array[pivotIndex]
		// #note that we already store array[pivotIndex] in pivotValue

		SHLC(right, 2, R7)
		ADD(array, R7, R7)
		LD(R7, 0, R7)
		ST(R7, 0, R0) // array[pivotIndex] = array[right]

		// # elements <= the pivot are moved to the left (smaller indices)

		MOVE(left, storeIndex) // storeIndex = left

		i = R7
		temp = R8
		MOVE(left, i)
		 
		L1: 
			CMPLT(i, right, R0) //for i in xrange(left,right)
			BEQ(R0, L2, R31) //exit #don't include array[right]

			SHLC(i, 2, R0)
			ADD(array, R0, R0)
			LD(R0, 0, temp) // temp = array[i]
		
			CMPLE(temp, pivotValue, R9) // if temp <= pivotValue:
			BEQ(R9, L3, R31) // else

			SHLC(storeIndex, 2, R10)
			ADD(array, R10, R10)
			LD(R10, 0, R11)
			ST(R11, 0, R0)	// array[i] = array[storeIndex]
			ST(temp, 0, R10) // array[storeIndex] = temp
		
			ADDC(storeIndex, 1, storeIndex) // storeIndex += 1
		
	L3:
		ADDC(i, 1, i)
		BR(L1)
		
	L2:
		SHLC(storeIndex, 2, R10)
		ADD(array, R10, R10)
		LD(R10, 0, R11)
		SHLC(right, 2, R9)
		ADD(array, R9, R9)
		ST(R11, 0, R9) // array[right] = array[storeIndex]
		
		ST(pivotValue, 0, R10) // array[storeIndex] = pivotValue;
		
		MOVE(storeIndex, R0) // return storeIndex;

		POP(R11)
		POP(R10)
		POP(R9)
		POP(R8)
		POP(R7)
		POP(R6)
		POP(R5)
		POP(R4)
		POP(R3)
		POP(R2)
		POP(R1)
        MOVE(BP, SP)
        POP(BP)
        POP(LP)
        JMP(LP)

//    if left < right:
//        pivotIndex = partition(array,left,right)
//        quicksort(array,left,pivotIndex-1)
//        quicksort(array,pivotIndex+1,right)

// quicksort(ArrayBase, left, right)
quicksort:
        PUSH(LP)
        PUSH(BP)
        MOVE(SP, BP)
		PUSH(R1)
		PUSH(R2)
		PUSH(R3)
		PUSH(R4)
		PUSH(R5)
		
		LD(BP, -12, R1)
		LD(BP, -16, R2)
		LD(BP, -20, R3)
		
		qs_array = R1
		qs_left = R2
		qs_right = R3
		
		CMPLT(qs_left, qs_right, R0) // if left < right
		BEQ(R0, END, R31) // else
		
		PUSH(qs_right)
		PUSH(qs_left)
		PUSH(qs_array)
		CALL(partition)
		POP(qs_array)
		POP(qs_left)
		POP(qs_right)
		
		MOVE(R0, R5) // pivotIndex = partition(array, left, right)
		
		SUBC(R5, 1, R4)
		PUSH(R4)
		PUSH(qs_left)
		PUSH(qs_array)
		CALL(quicksort) // quicksort(array, left, pivotIndex-1)
		POP(array)
		POP(left)
		POP(R4)
		
		ADDC(R5, 1, R4)
		PUSH(qs_right)
		PUSH(R4)
		PUSH(qs_array)
		CALL(quicksort) // quicksort(array, pivotIndex+1, right)
		POP(array)
		POP(R4)
		POP(right)
		
END:
		POP(R5)
		POP(R4)
		POP(R3)
		POP(R2)
		POP(R1)
        MOVE(BP, SP)
        POP(BP)
        POP(LP)
        JMP(LP)

// Allocate a stack: SP is initialized by checkoff code.
StackBasePtr:
        LONG(StackArea)

.unprotect

StackArea:
        STORAGE(1000)
"}}
